title: The Bitfinex Hack
description: A 60-second lesson on The Bitfinex Hack.

hook.text: In 2016, hackers stole 120,000 Bitcoins from Bitfinex â€” worth $72 million at the time. The coins sat untouched for years.

buildup.text: The stolen coins were traced on the blockchain but never moved. The thief seemed patient.

discovery.text: In 2022, the FBI arrested a married couple in New York. They had been slowly laundering the coins through complex chains.

twist.text: By the time of arrest, the stolen Bitcoin was worth $4.5 billion. It was the largest financial seizure in US history.

climax.text: The couple stored private keys in a cloud account. One of the simplest mistakes led to one of the biggest arrests.

punchline.text: They stole $4.5 billion in Bitcoin. A cloud backup gave them away.

quiz.question: How were the Bitfinex hackers eventually caught?
options: They stored private keys in a traceable cloud account
